testcase.name: Looking up the definition of 'apple'
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the Wikionary home page................................passed When the user looks up the definition of the word 'apple'...................passed Then they should see the definition 'A common, round fruit produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates.'.passed

testcase.name: Looking up the definition of 'pear'
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the Wikionary home page................................passed When the user looks up the definition of the word 'pear'....................passed Then they should see the definition 'An edible fruit produced by the pear tree, similar to an apple but elongated towards the stem.'.passed
